alert.note: Alert for Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued August 30 at 2:05AM EDT until August 30 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Coastal flooding peaking at 1 to 2 feet above mean high tide. * WHERE...Middle Keys. * WHEN...Until early this afternoon, but especially during the morning high tide. Coastal flood statements or advisories may need to be extended into Thursday or Friday. * IMPACTS...Saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is expected. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
